ELEMENT.DEFAULT: Hello, welcome to our wonderful website!
ELEMENT.HELPER: Remember to keep this text short and to the point. If this is too long, or not helpful visitors probably won't go any further. A lot of businesses talk about what makes their products unique, or their excellent customer service. If you have neither of those, then consider simply welcoming the customer.

ELEMENT.HELP: You can add products to your homepage, when you do they will appear below.
